characterDescription: Ba-Ado-Mishram is one of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar. She has been described as being Connected to the Parshendi, facilitating them with forms of power and providing them with Voidlight.

characterDetails.History: Around two thousand years after the Last Desolation, near when the Recreance occurred, there was the False Desolation. Ba-Ado-Mishram Connected then with the singers and provided them forms of power and Voidlight as Odium once did in the Desolations. The Knights Radiant sought to stop this threat by imprisoning Ba-Ado-Mishram. While they succeeded, in so doing they stole part of those singers' souls, ripping out both their Connection and Identity. These singers no longer had a form and were termed 'slaveform'.
characterDetails.Character: She is said to be keen of mind, a 'highprincess' among enemy forces, and their commander during some of the Desolations.
characterDetails.Notes: Brandon has confirmed that the Unmade are Splinters of Odium. Odium splintered himself and created the Unmade to be his influence on Roshar. It is through the Unmade that Odium may be able to influence people there in how they think or act.
